Old Trafford Stadium Hotel.name: Old Trafford Stadium Hotel
Old Trafford Stadium Hotel.overview: A modern and comfortable hotel providing convenient accommodation.

details.text: 699 Chester Rd, Old Trafford, Stretford, Manchester M16 0GW

usefulInformation.text: 2.5 miles from the centre of Manchester.

Old Trafford Stadium Hotel.distance: 0.2 miles from manchester utd football stadium
Old Trafford Stadium Hotel.description: Old Trafford Stadium Hotel offers rooms in the historical The Trafford pub in Manchester, attractively situated 100 yards from Old Trafford Stadium and 500 yards from the Emirates Cricket Stadium. Private parking can also be arranged on match days on request for a surcharge.The equipped rooms feature large screen TVs, WiFi, mini-fridges and kettles. Victoria Warehouse is 1,050 yards from the hotel, and the city centre is 2 miles away. The nearest airport is Manchester Airport, 9.3 miles from the property.

Premier Inn Manchester Old Trafford hote.name: Premier Inn Manchester Old Trafford hotel
Premier Inn Manchester Old Trafford hote.overview: Within sight of Old Trafford football stadium, this modern no-frills hotel is also a 15-minute walk from Salford Quays for shopping.

details.text: Sir Alex Ferguson Way, Trafford Park, Stretford, Manchester M17 1WS

usefulInformation.text: 2.5 miles from the centre of Manchester.

Premier Inn Manchester Old Trafford hote.distance: 0.6 miles from Old Trafford football stadium
Premier Inn Manchester Old Trafford hote.description: Within sight of Old Trafford football stadium, this modern no-frills hotel is also a 15-minute walk from Salford Quays for shopping. Rooms range from singles to family rooms with 2 pull-out beds, where kids aged 15 and under eat and stay free with paying adults. In-room amenities feature free WiFi, pillow-top mattresses and en suite bathrooms with showers, as well as tea and coffeemaking facilities, TVs and desks.There's an on-site Thyme restaurant/bar and free parking. Breakfast (an extra cost) includes all-you-can-eat and light choices. There are also 8 meeting rooms.

Hotel Football, a Tribute Portfolio Hote.name: Hotel Football, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
Hotel Football, a Tribute Portfolio Hote.overview: From football fanatics to foodies, business and leisure travellers - Hotel Football Old Trafford offers something for everyone.

details.text: Old Trafford, 99 Sir Matt Busby Way, Manchester M16 0SZ

usefulInformation.text: 2.5 miles from the centre of Manchester.

Hotel Football, a Tribute Portfolio Hote.distance: 0.1 miles from Old Trafford football stadium
Hotel Football, a Tribute Portfolio Hote.description: The 133-room hotel has unmatched views over Old Trafford, and offers an industry leading medley of award-winning service, food, unique bedrooms and event and meeting spaces, designed to take your experience to the next level. Hotel Football is the brainchild of the Class of 92 - a world renowned group of players including Gary Neville, Ryan Giggs, Paul Scholes, Nicky Butt and Philip Neville, united together not only by football and friendship but heritage, quality, ambition and an unrelenting desire to win. Since launching in 2015, Hotel Football has become one of the most talked about hotels in Manchester. In addition to the rooms, it features the restaurant 'Cafe Football', as well as a number of events spaces (many of which transform into hospitality areas on Manchester United matchdays), including the rooftop football pitch 'Heaven' and the Old Trafford Supporters Club.

Hilton Garden Inn Manchester.name: Hilton Garden Inn Manchester
Hilton Garden Inn Manchester.overview: Set within Emirates Old Trafford cricket ground, this relaxed hotel is a minute's walk from the nearest tram stop and a 12-minute walk from Old Trafford football stadium, home of Manchester United..

details.text: Talbot Rd, Old Trafford, Stretford, Manchester M16 0PX, United Kingdom

Hilton Garden Inn Manchester.distance: 0.5 miles from Old Trafford football stadium
Hilton Garden Inn Manchester.description: Set within Emirates Old Trafford cricket ground, this relaxed hotel is a minute's walk from the nearest tram stop and a 12-minute walk from Old Trafford football stadium, home of Manchester United. Straightforward rooms come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minifridges, plus tea and coffeemaking facilities; some offer sofabeds. Upgraded rooms add balconies and/or cricket ground views. Room service is available.Parking is offered. Other amenities include a bright restaurant/bar, a fitness room and a 24-hour convenience store.
